com.radirius.mercury.graphics

Class SubTexture

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radirius.mercury.graphics.Texture
      • com.radirius.mercury.graphics.SubTexture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Resource, Cloneable

    public class SubTexture
extends Texture
    A class for sub-textures. These objects are just like regular textures, but represent a portion of them.
    Author:
    wessles

      Texture convertToTexture()
      This is useful for when you want the functionality of a real Texture from a SubTexture, such as GL_REPEAT, which is impossible with SubTextures.

    • Method Detail

      • convertToTexture

        public Texture convertToTexture()
        This is useful for when you want the functionality of a real Texture from a SubTexture, such as GL_REPEAT, which is impossible with SubTextures.
        Returns:
        A Texture version of the SubTexture.

      • getParent

        public Texture getParent()
        Returns:
        Returns the parent Texture.

      • getSubX

        public int getSubX()
        Returns:
        The x location of the subtexture on the parent texture.

      • getSubY

        public int getSubY()
        Returns:
        The y location of the subtexture on the parent texture.

      • getSubX2

        public int getSubX2()
        Returns:
        The second x location of the subtexture on the parent texture.

      • getSubY2

        public int getSubY2()
        Returns:
        The second y location of the subtexture on the parent texture.

        public int getWidth()
        Overrides:
